id.description: A unique identifier for the room composition.

room_id.description: Identify the room associated with the room composition.

session_id.description: Identify the room session associated with the room composition.

user_id.description: Identify the user associated with the room composition.

size_mb.description: Shows the room composition size in MB.

duration_secs.description: Shows the room composition duration in seconds.

format.description: Shows format of the room composition.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the room composition was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the room composition was updated.

ended_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the room composition has ended.

started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the room composition has stated.

completed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the room composition has completed.

video_layout.description: Describes the video layout of the room composition in terms of regions. Limited to 2 regions.

webhook_event_url.description: The URL where webhooks related to this room composition will be sent. Must include a scheme, such as 'https'.

webhook_event_failover_url.description: The failover URL where webhooks related to this room composition will be sent if sending to the primary URL fails. Must include a scheme, such as 'https'.

webhook_timeout_secs.description: Specifies how many seconds to wait before timing out a webhook.
